data.text: @NOLADuchess Not that I have a car for me to drive ATM, but I could go back to work and driving the yard truck and equipment.
@wrytersblockDH Dammit, tell them you have the microchip implanted now, you'll be fine. 🤣

@NOLADuchess On my 3rd different heart med. Had a loop recorder inserted in my chest (I'm now part cyborg!) and a stint in my heart. 6 different hospitals all told. So far. Still not cleared to drive yet.
@NOLADuchess Yeah... it's been a hell of  trip since Dec 30th. Lost about 30 pounds since, but not a diet plan I'd recommend to any one I like . LOL
@NOLADuchess Hey, as of yesterday it's been 22 days since I saw the inside of a hospital for any reason. Been home (my home) 21 consecutive days too. Longest streaks since Dec 30th.

@wrytersblockDH Damn right, if older ladies can do it, they can too. Plus, I have to get out of here brother. I can't look at another SE Louisiana site. As soon as we can I want a private villa in the Caribbean. I need some scenery in my life. Been looking at my walls for a year. 🤪

@NOLADuchess There's 70 and 80 and 90 year old ladies doing it without a blink. Ask them for their cajones to hold in your purse until they are ready to have them. 😜🤣🤣🤣. First shot I'm still waiting to feel her inject it. :P

@wrytersblockDH I got mine done so if the boys have any bad side effects I'll be here to take care of them and I'll be safe. They're being slippery about what date I can schedule them, I think they're worried, but they're going if I have to hog-tie them and roll them in in a cart. 🤣
@NOLADuchess Soon as the state opened up 16+ with medical conditions back in March my sister lined us up appointments. #2 happened 4/7.
@wrytersblockDH Glad to hear it my friend. I hope hearing that a lot of people are experiencing little to nothing will encourage people that were worried to go and get theirs. 👍🏼

@NOLADuchess I had Moderna too. #2 shot I couldn't really lay on that side, couldn't lift arm above straight level, and the muscle was a little sore. By the next day everything was good.  #KissMeImVaccinated
